capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and an incredible witch in her own right. I've always admired her dedication to the Hogwarts community and her unwavering commitment to fighting against darkness and evil. As someone who values fairness, justice, and compassion, I think she's an exemplary role model for anyone looking to make a positive impact in the world.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of professor mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall makes a great Vice-President of Hogwarts. She's always been very fair and just in her decision-making, which is essential for the school. I've seen her handle difficult situations with ease and authority, and she's always put the needs of the students first.
